greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ON (black) cells in the n-th iteration of the "Rule 3" elementary cellular automaton starting with a single ON (black) cell.
comment: This sequence is A000012 and A016813 interspersed.
Also column 1 of A271343. - _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 06 2016
reference: S. Wolfram, A New Kind of Science, Wolfram Media, 2002; p. 55.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Elementary Cellular Automaton
Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
formula: Conjectured g.f.: (1 + x - x^2 + 3*x^3)/(-1 + x^2)^2. - _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 21 2015
example: First 12 rows, replacing "0" with "." for better visibility of ON cells, followed by the total number of 1's per row:
results.author: _Robert Price_, Dec 20 2015
